img_above_text:
![Wukong Lanxi 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/86/Wukong_Lanxi_19.jpg)
Just outside the shack, there's a small garden area with yet more Stone Spiders, and a Mushroom you can try to harvest only to reveal a formidable Fungiman instead.
img_below_text:
To the right, another Dragonfly Guai will try to pepper you with arrows from a high ledge, but you'll also want to check the far left corner past the archway for the Estate of the Zhu Shrine.
When resting at this shrine, it's a good time to remind yourself that you can start amassing resources to craft both the Golden Armor Set from beating Yellowbrow, and the Spikeshaft Staff. You should also plan to revisit the Zodiac Village, as both the Xu Dog and Shen Monkey will have new wares to sell (plus you may have better equipment to challenge the Yin Tiger if you haven't already).

        - Following Text: "To the right, another Dragonfly Guai will try to pepper you with arrows from a high ledge, but you'll also want to check the far left corner past the archway for the Estate of the Zhu Shrine.
When resting at this shrine, it's a good time to remind yourself that you can start amassing resources to craft both the Golden Armor Set from beating Yellowbrow, and the Spikeshaft Staff. You should also plan to revisit the Zodiac Village, as both the Xu Dog and Shen Monkey will have new wares to sell (plus you may have better equipment to challenge the Yin Tiger if you haven't already)."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong" depicts a combat scene where the player character is engaged in a battle with a Dragonfly Guai, an enemy that attacks from a high ledge. The context suggests that this encounter occurs near a small garden area outside a shack, where players can also find a Mushroom that turns into a Fungiman. The image serves to illustrate the challenging enemies and strategic combat situations players will face in this part of the game.
